market_regime.summary: Markets in consolidation mode with ES futures down -0.1% at 6976.75 and NQ futures flat at 25689.0. VIX at 15.86 indicates complacent conditions but not extreme euphoria. Absence of major catalysts (earnings, economic data, news flow) suggests low-volatility drift ahead of next week's potential market movers.

watchlist.trigger: Break above 700 with volume expansion or decline below 690 support
Earnings catalyst from mega-cap tech next week or macro data shift

watchlist.setup: Compressed volatility at 15.86 near cycle lows
watchlist.trigger: Spike above 18 on any unexpected news or geopolitical event

risks: Weekend geopolitical developments could gap markets Monday
Low volume environment makes any news impact more pronounced
VIX compression at 15.86 suggests complacency - any catalyst could trigger vol expansion
key_questions: Will next week's earnings season provide directional catalyst for tech megacaps?
Are markets too complacent with VIX sub-16 heading into earnings season?
What macro catalyst will break the current low-volatility consolidation pattern?
